title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.14 - Field wagering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.14 - Field wagering

State Regulations

When more horses representing separate interests are
started in a race than the number of post positions on the infield tote
commission, all horses in excess of a number of interests one less than the
total number of post positions on the infield tote commission shall be grouped
in the betting as the field. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
